reviews.review: Один из лучших кооперативных боевиков, интересный и затягивающий.
You can play it for the actual CS:S gameplay or you can play it for any one of the mods, theres a reason why its still $20 after ..holy shit 12 years?
Muito bom ... reviver a nostalgia dos tempos de infancia jogando CS na lan com grafico e jogabilidade melhorados =D
Pretty good game for an "old" game :)
A classic shooter with many flaws but still enjoyable to this day. If you're interested in competitive play you should go for the most recent iteration however.
Personaly, i like GO better and i only like this for garys mod.

綺麗なカウンターストライク。それだけ、ちょこっとマップ構造が変わってたり細かい修正が入ってる点以外は普通のCSと同じ。
どっちを遊んでも玄人のゲームなのでフルボッコされてMに目覚めて次第に上手くなり玄人の仲間入りすると共にSになっていく自信がなければいらない。
If you want to play pretend guns whilst sharing some virtual space with racist 14 year old Germans, buy this immediately.
A good FPS game. But cs1.6 and csgo are better!
Hold back! this bomb-throwing, head-shooting, bomb-planting action game rules!
Macht total Spaß. Sehr zu empfehlen. Wenn man dann noch paar Leute kennt und mit den zusammen zockt ist es bestes Spiel Evaa :D
PEW PEW PEW PEW PEW BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEEEP BANG, TERRORIST WIN.

Ein Spiel was ewig Spaß macht, es hat einfach kein Ende. ^^
Man misst sich immer wieder mit anderen Usern, und will sich stetig verbessern.
Zudem hat es extrem viele Modi, vom einfachen TDM zu Matches über Roleplay Server bis zu Kletter-, Surf-, oder Bhop-Server.
Die Standartkarten sind eher auf Wettkampf ausgelegt, sprich man braucht Skill.
Deswegen kann es auch sein, dass man Anfangs noch nicht so seinen Spaß daran findet.
Ich fand es von Anfang an sehr sehr gut. Ein Shooter der durch sein Gameplay motiviert und dadruch, dass man sich immer weiter verbessern möchte (also Skill-technisch), statt wie die meisten anderen Spielen, einfach mit Unlocks die Spieler zum weiterspielen zu bringen.
Für mich persönlich der beste Shooter. Ein Spiel was nur durch seine Fortsetzungen geschlagen werden kann. Viel Spaß! :)

I recommend Counter-Strike: Source. Want to be a terrorist without going to jail? Or do you want to go to jail, even if you're not a terrorist? Play this game! There's fun custom game modes that suit any and all. From Gun-Game, to Jail-Break, this game amuses most people. It's a great alternative to CoD.

Personally I definitly prefer 1.6 over this version of counter-strike, but this one is still a great game. in my opinion they made this one easier than 1.6 and this one also focus more on graphics and physics. since this game run on the source engine (hl2 engine) where physics have taken more into consideration than in the hl engine, this one got ragdolls as well as more moveable props and destructable objects in a more detailed manner. where 1.6 offer better gameplay experience in my personal opinion, I'd say this one try to compensate it slightly in graphics. this is still a great game though.

I'm one of those guys who finds games way better than other games by a longshot,in this topic is Counter Strike:Source,Its really addicting,and really classy for a first person shooter multiplayer shooting game. It has its pros and cons but pros overule cons by alot. Just dont let get the experts who have been playing for 8 years straight Get over your head.
Závislosť ktorá trvá a trvá a trvá...
Great FPS and a good thing to get along with Garry's Mod
é bom esse game para quem gosta dos cs antigos
CS:S is a great online shooter game with a brilliant, fun community. There are many different gamemodes such as Jailbreak, Surf and Zombie Survival. Would recommend to fans of FPS games.
Also ich fins doch garnicht mal so schlecht ;D
The fps classic Counter-Strike: Source is a must buy!!!

Pro's: 
 - Simple to learn
 - Balanced gameplay, no OP perks
 - Great mod community
 - Many mini-games to explore
 - Timeless PC classic
 - Often in Steam Sales

Con's: 
 - Quite odd getting used to not having iron-sights and sprinting, but once you do, it's fine
 - Graphics are now a little outdated, but still very playable

Rating: 72 / 99

Превосходно! Играбельный шутер и реванш!
Движок Source очень превосходно!
Никто нас, все вроде!

不错的游戏~嗯哼
真正的好游戏，不是CFGO能比的，拥有它吧@

★★★★★★★★★☆
9/10 Probably the best Counter-Strike ever =] ツ
Игра самая высшая. Лучше не было и не будет)))
A game that still holds weight and despite being 12 years old (2016) I'd easily put this over countless modern games. Have recommended to enough people that I should be entitled to sales commissions.

So addicted o.o

This game is not like your ordinary first person shooter, This adds a lot to that catagory. You can have your own server with all fun things! I personaly like the gun games. Love it and probably will never stop playing it!

It may seem like its not worth it, but give it a try if i goes on sale for 5 bucks. u can play cool mods like zombie escape, death run, and Trouble in Terrorist town, which u cant do with GO. wait for this to go for a lower price though XD. It also runs a lot faster that GO for bad computers, and its at least better than basic CS

i have played this 223 hours biatch

i wish i could go to the good ol days where i only played this game everyday allday :(
a very nice nostalgic game :)
С этого шутера от первого лица все учились играть в этот жанр. Не такая хардкорная как 1.6 , но и не такое говно как го.
This is an old game but lots of fun if you can find the right servers to play on
«Counter-Strike: Source» просто должен занять почетное место в коллекции каждого поклонника жанра «экшен».
i spend a lot of time on this games. I love this game and it was worth 20$
can't right click on most guns
Counter Strike Source is a great experience with a plethora of amazing communities. Most clans are flourshing and game-modes add replayability to this classic game.
Great game to play with friends. ^^

카숏 처음 접했을땐 정말 이거 하나면 죽을때 까지 할 게임  이라고 생각했지만...
게임을 하다보면서 "motd" 란게 나의 생각의 바꿔놓은 게임.
물론 게임에 "룰" 이 필요하지만
게임에 목숨걸고,자존심 까지 팔게하는 "motd" 를 보면서 정말 이게임에 질렸다.
항상 싸움나면 사람들은 motd 보라고 따지지만 
그분들한테 묻고 싶습니다.
과연 당신은 지금 "현실" 세상에서 의 법을 motd 처럼 지키고 사시나요?
Mad game ive been playing it for ages and its keeping up with all the popular games, defs a 10/10 must download

best fun/pro game ever. 

must play =D

Prenez une arme, calez des casques (et jouez la bombe aussi..).

C'est tout bête, mais on perd jamais l'envie d'y rejouer !
Les graphismes sont simples mais propres, et les animations sont réussies, notamment les switch d'armes.
Pour les succès, les derniers étant un peu hardus.. les collectionneurs vont apprécier.
Counter-Strike: Source, ну что тут сказать. Игра-легенда.

It's pretty good when it's not PISSING ME THE FUCK OFF. I don't got 1337 haxxor skills, man. I'm just a regular guy with regular guy hands and regular guy reflexes. Gun game, AKA instant gratification murder spree happy tiemz weeheehee, is always enjoyable though. Is that totally missing the point of this game? Hell yeah! But that's another great thing about this game: all the user-generated craziness.

If you'd like to shoot someone in the face with a gun, this is a good game for that. I heard China uses this to train their soldiers or some shit too, so maybe if you play this game a whole bunch, you could become the world's greatest terrorist.

Gaben. 9/11. Both end with "en". Coincidence?


I think not.
CS:S: Super Spiel, zeitintensiv bis man gut ist, teils frustrierend. Einer der besten Competitive Shooter da draußen.

Классика жанра и отличное продолжение 1.6.
Лучше бы я сейчас играл в это(
A good game. Hope you like it.
